object_1.look: It feels like it's missing something.

object_2.look: Nothing interesting in the cabinet last time I looked.

object_3.look: The box looks much better placed there now.

object_5.look: We used to stick bulletins there.

object_7.look: It's turned off but it's bright enough in here.

object_8.look: It's turned off but it's bright enough in here.

object_9.look: This mat used to be a different color.

object_10.look: That's my way out of here.

use.say: All looks good now! I'm out of here!
I can't leave till I've cleaned up here.
